name: InstaPot Vegan Yogurt
instructions: Soak the Oatmeal in 4 cups of water (in the blender carafe) for 1 to 2 hours
Soak the Cashews separately in water for 1 to 2 hours
Drain the cashews and add them to the blender carafe
Blend for 1 to 5 minutes until smooth
Pour into a thick bottomed pot and heat over medium heat, stir continuously until desired thickness (5 - 10 minutes)
Place in fridge until cool to the touch
Pour in the instapot, add the yogurt and put on Yogurt setting for 9 to 10 hours
